faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have more questions? Contact our support team.

items.title: What is a Ghibli-style image?
items.description: A Ghibli-style image captures the distinctive artistic style of Studio Ghibli animations, characterized by detailed backgrounds, vibrant colors, and a magical atmosphere.

items.title: How does the Ghibli style generator work?
items.description: Our AI analyzes your input image and transforms it using advanced machine learning models trained on Studio Ghibli's artistic style, maintaining the essence while creating a unique interpretation.

items.title: What types of images can I convert to Ghibli style?
items.description: You can convert any type of image, including portraits, landscapes, cityscapes, and nature photos. The generator works best with clear, well-lit images.

items.title: How long does it take to generate a Ghibli-style image?
items.description: Most transformations are completed within seconds. Processing time may vary depending on image size and complexity.

items.title: What resolution are the generated Ghibli-style images?
items.description: Free users get standard resolution (1024x1024), while Pro users can generate high-resolution images (2048x2048 or higher).

items.title: Can I customize the Ghibli style transformation?
items.description: Yes! Pro users can adjust various parameters like color intensity, style strength, and artistic elements to achieve their desired look.

items.title: Do I own the rights to the generated Ghibli-style images?
items.description: Yes, you retain full rights to any images you create using our service. The AI-generated content is yours to use as you wish.

items.title: How many Ghibli-style images can I generate?
items.description: Free users get 5 credits per month, Pro users get 100 credits, and Enterprise users have unlimited generation capacity.

items.title: What file formats are supported?
items.description: We support common image formats including JPG, PNG, and WebP. Generated images are provided in high-quality PNG format.

items.title: Is there a batch processing feature?
items.description: Yes, Pro and Enterprise users can process multiple images at once, saving time on large projects.
